title: is OCE every getting 3v3 back properly?
body: are we ever getting 3v3 for good? if it can be enabled and disabled for 2 days a week why cant it just be left on? it gives us something different to do when you dont feel like 5s but hate arams

replies.body:
It can't be left on because the community is too small.

If you want it always on, get everyone you know, and everyone they know to play on OCE.

Server Population needs to be increased in order to have all queues open all the time.

There's no plans to widen the availability right now. Currently the queue is in a good place for the times it is available, but it's not in a place where we can widen that availability.

I hear you that it's frustrating, i play it as much as I can when it's up and wish it was on all the time - but it's ultimately about the numbers. We regularly evaluate it, as we do with all of our queues, if this status changes we'll post it on boards ahead of time to let you know.
Any chance of getting **Ranked** Twisted Treeline to replace or supplement at least one of the current scheduled days?
Bring a couple of million people onto the server, then we'll talk.
When is it ever available i can never even access it temporarily

There is a stickied topic that says when it's available.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/HAK2vcae-twisted-treeline-team-builder-and-ranked-sr-schedule
